Table.name: BI_DIM_USER_DETAIL
Table.SQL: %OS_ACTOR_TYPE_ID% is null OR (%OS_ACTOR_TYPE_ID% in (14014,16646, 16746, 17846) AND "Assigned_User"."UD_USER_ROLE_ID" in (14014,16646, 16746, 17846))

Level.description: Name of the user task is assigned to

View.SQL: SELECT CD.CIL_INCIDENTLOSS_ID, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM ID_INCIDENT_DT) td_year, to_number(to_char(ID_INCIDENT_DT, 'Q')) td_quarter, 'Q' || to_char(ID_INCIDENT_DT, 'Q') td_quarter_name, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM ID_INCIDENT_DT) td_month, to_char(ID_INCIDENT_DT, 'Mon') td_month_name, EXTRACT(DAY FROM ID_INCIDENT_DT) td_day, ID_INCIDENT_DT td_date FROM BI_DIM_OC_INCIDENT_DETAIL I, BI_FACT_OC_INCIDENTLOSS CD WHERE I.ID_INCIDENT_ID = CD.ID_INCIDENT_ID

SELECT CD.CIL_INCIDENTLOSS_ID, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM ID_INCIDENT_REPORTED_DT) td_year, to_number(to_char(ID_INCIDENT_REPORTED_DT, 'Q')) td_quarter, 'Q' || to_char(ID_INCIDENT_REPORTED_DT, 'Q') td_quarter_name, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM ID_INCIDENT_REPORTED_DT) td_month, to_char(ID_INCIDENT_REPORTED_DT, 'Mon') td_month_name, EXTRACT(DAY FROM ID_INCIDENT_REPORTED_DT) td_day, ID_INCIDENT_REPORTED_DT td_date FROM BI_DIM_OC_INCIDENT_DETAIL I, BI_FACT_OC_INCIDENTLOSS CD WHERE I.ID_INCIDENT_ID = CD.ID_INCIDENT_ID

SELECT CIL_INCIDENTLOSS_ID, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CIL_LAST_UPDATED_DT) td_year, to_number(to_char(CIL_LAST_UPDATED_DT, 'Q')) td_quarter, 'Q' || to_char(CIL_LAST_UPDATED_DT, 'Q') td_quarter_name, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CIL_LAST_UPDATED_DT) td_month, to_char(CIL_LAST_UPDATED_DT, 'Mon') td_month_name, EXTRACT(DAY FROM CIL_LAST_UPDATED_DT) td_day, CIL_LAST_UPDATED_DT td_date FROM BI_FACT_OC_INCIDENTLOSS

Level.name: Last Updated Quarter
Level.description: Name or number of the Quarter

View.SQL: SELECT CIL_INCIDENTLOSS_ID, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CIL_CREATED_DT) td_year, to_number(to_char(CIL_CREATED_DT, 'Q')) td_quarter, 'Q' || to_char(CIL_CREATED_DT, 'Q') td_quarter_name, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CIL_CREATED_DT) td_month, to_char(CIL_CREATED_DT, 'Mon') td_month_name, EXTRACT(DAY FROM CIL_CREATED_DT) td_day, CIL_CREATED_DT td_date FROM BI_FACT_OC_INCIDENTLOSS

Level.caption: Creation Quarter

View.SQL: SELECT cd_claim_id, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM cd_claim_creation_dt) td_year, to_number(to_char(cd_claim_creation_dt, 'Q')) td_quarter, 'Q' || to_char(cd_claim_creation_dt, 'Q') td_quarter_name, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM cd_claim_creation_dt) td_month, to_char(cd_claim_creation_dt, 'Mon') td_month_name, EXTRACT(DAY FROM cd_claim_creation_dt) td_day, cd_claim_creation_dt td_date FROM bi_fact_oc_claim_detail

View.SQL: SELECT CD.CD_CLAIM_ID, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM ID_INCIDENT_DT) td_year, to_number(to_char(ID_INCIDENT_DT, 'Q')) td_quarter, 'Q' || to_char(ID_INCIDENT_DT, 'Q') td_quarter_name, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM ID_INCIDENT_DT) td_month, to_char(ID_INCIDENT_DT, 'Mon') td_month_name, EXTRACT(DAY FROM ID_INCIDENT_DT) td_day, ID_INCIDENT_DT td_date FROM BI_DIM_OC_INCIDENT_DETAIL I, BI_FACT_OC_CLAIM_DETAIL CD WHERE I.ID_INCIDENT_ID = CD.CD_INCIDENT_ID

SELECT CD.CD_CLAIM_ID, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM ID_INCIDENT_REPORTED_DT) td_year, to_number(to_char(ID_INCIDENT_REPORTED_DT, 'Q')) td_quarter, 'Q' || to_char(ID_INCIDENT_REPORTED_DT, 'Q') td_quarter_name, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM ID_INCIDENT_REPORTED_DT) td_month, to_char(ID_INCIDENT_REPORTED_DT, 'Mon') td_month_name, EXTRACT(DAY FROM ID_INCIDENT_REPORTED_DT) td_day, ID_INCIDENT_REPORTED_DT td_date FROM BI_DIM_OC_INCIDENT_DETAIL I, BI_FACT_OC_CLAIM_DETAIL CD WHERE I.ID_INCIDENT_ID = CD.CD_INCIDENT_ID

SELECT SC_SUBCLAIM_ID, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SC_CREATION_DT) td_year, to_number(to_char(SC_CREATION_DT, 'Q')) td_quarter, 'Q' || to_char(SC_CREATION_DT, 'Q') td_quarter_name, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SC_CREATION_DT) td_month, to_char(SC_CREATION_DT, 'Mon') td_month_name, EXTRACT(DAY FROM SC_CREATION_DT) td_day, SC_CREATION_DT td_date FROM BI_FACT_OC_SUBCLAIM_DETAIL

View.SQL: SELECT SC_SUBCLAIM_ID, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SC_LAST_UPDATED_DT) td_year, to_number(to_char(SC_LAST_UPDATED_DT, 'Q')) td_quarter, 'Q' || to_char(SC_LAST_UPDATED_DT, 'Q') td_quarter_name, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SC_LAST_UPDATED_DT) td_month, to_char(SC_LAST_UPDATED_DT, 'Mon') td_month_name, EXTRACT(DAY FROM SC_LAST_UPDATED_DT) td_day, sc_last_updated_dt td_date FROM BI_FACT_OC_SUBCLAIM_DETAIL

View.SQL: SELECT CD.SC_SUBCLAIM_ID, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM ID_INCIDENT_DT) td_year, to_number(to_char(ID_INCIDENT_DT, 'Q')) td_quarter, 'Q' || to_char(ID_INCIDENT_DT, 'Q') td_quarter_name, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM ID_INCIDENT_DT) td_month, to_char(ID_INCIDENT_DT, 'Mon') td_month_name, EXTRACT(DAY FROM ID_INCIDENT_DT) td_day, ID_INCIDENT_DT td_date FROM BI_DIM_OC_INCIDENT_DETAIL I, BI_FACT_OC_SUBCLAIM_DETAIL CD WHERE I.ID_INCIDENT_ID = CD.SC_INCIDENT_ID

SELECT CD.SC_SUBCLAIM_ID, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM ID_INCIDENT_REPORTED_DT) td_year, to_number(to_char(ID_INCIDENT_REPORTED_DT, 'Q')) td_quarter, 'Q' || to_char(ID_INCIDENT_REPORTED_DT, 'Q') td_quarter_name, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM ID_INCIDENT_REPORTED_DT) td_month, to_char(ID_INCIDENT_REPORTED_DT, 'Mon') td_month_name, EXTRACT(DAY FROM ID_INCIDENT_REPORTED_DT) td_day, ID_INCIDENT_REPORTED_DT td_date FROM BI_DIM_OC_INCIDENT_DETAIL I, BI_FACT_OC_SUBCLAIM_DETAIL CD WHERE I.ID_INCIDENT_ID = CD.SC_INCIDENT_ID

Measure.name: Outstanding Reserve Amount
Measure.caption: Outstanding Reserve Amount
Measure.description: Total outstanding reserve amount which is sum of Indemnity, Legal, Expense Reserve

Level.name: Task Type
Level.caption: %{dimension.task_type.task_type.caption}
Level.description: Type of task. Useful if this is a system generated task

Level.name: Task Title
Level.caption: Task Title
Level.description: Title of task. Useful if this is a system generated task

KeyExpression.SQL: case when TD_OVERDUE_IND=1 then 'Yes' when TD_OVERDUE_IND=2 then 'No' when TD_OVERDUE_IND is null then 'No' else 'No' end

Level.name: Internal
Level.caption: %{dimension.internal.internal.caption}
Level.description: Is the task being assigned internally ?

KeyExpression.SQL: case when TD_INTERNAL_IND=1 then 'Yes' when TD_INTERNAL_IND=2 then 'No' when TD_INTERNAL_IND is null then 'No' else 'No' end
case when TD_STATUS_IND=1 then 'Complete' when TD_STATUS_IND=2 then 'Incomplete' when TD_STATUS_IND is null then 'N/A' else 'N/A' end

View.SQL: SELECT TD_TASK_ID, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM TD_CREATE_DT) td_year, to_number(to_char(TD_CREATE_DT, 'Q')) td_quarter, 'Q' || to_char(TD_CREATE_DT, 'Q') td_quarter_name, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM TD_CREATE_DT) td_month, to_char(TD_CREATE_DT, 'Mon') td_month_name, EXTRACT(DAY FROM TD_CREATE_DT) td_day, TD_CREATE_DT td_date FROM BI_FACT_TASK_DETAIL

Level.name: Creation Quarter
Level.caption: Creation Quarter
Level.description: Name or number of the Quarter

View.SQL: SELECT TD_TASK_ID, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM TD_COMPLETED_DT) td_year, to_number(to_char(TD_COMPLETED_DT)) td_quarter, 'Q' || to_char(TD_COMPLETED_DT, 'Q') td_quarter_name, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM TD_COMPLETED_DT) td_month, to_char(TD_COMPLETED_DT, 'Mon') td_month_name, EXTRACT(DAY FROM TD_COMPLETED_DT) td_day, TD_COMPLETED_DT td_date FROM BI_FACT_TASK_DETAIL

Level.name: Completed Quarter
Level.description: Name or number of the Quarter

View.SQL: SELECT TD_TASK_ID, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM TD_DUE_DT) td_year, to_number(to_char(TD_DUE_DT, 'Q')) td_quarter, 'Q' || to_char(TD_DUE_DT, 'Q') td_quarter_name, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM TD_DUE_DT) td_month, to_char(TD_DUE_DT, 'Mon') td_month_name, EXTRACT(DAY FROM TD_DUE_DT) td_day, TD_DUE_DT td_date FROM BI_FACT_TASK_DETAIL

Level.name: Due Date Quarter
Level.caption: %{shared.dimension.time(due_date).due_date_quarter.caption}
Level.description: Name or number of the Quarter

MeasureExpression.SQL: case when TD_STATUS_IND = 1 and TD_COMPLETED_DT < TD_DUE_DT and TD_COMPLETED_DT != '01-JAN-1900' then 1 else 0 end
case when TD_STATUS_IND = 1 and (TD_COMPLETED_DT > TD_DUE_DT or TD_COMPLETED_DT = '01-JAN-1900') then 1 else 0 end

View.SQL: SELECT SCT_ID, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SCT_TRX_EFF_DATE) td_year, to_number(to_char(SCT_TRX_EFF_DATE, 'Q')) td_quarter, 'Q' || to_char(SCT_TRX_EFF_DATE, 'Q') td_quarter_name, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SCT_TRX_EFF_DATE) td_month, to_char(SCT_TRX_EFF_DATE, 'Mon') td_month_name, EXTRACT(DAY FROM SCT_TRX_EFF_DATE) td_day, SCT_TRX_EFF_DATE td_date FROM BI_FACT_SUBCLAIM_TRX_DETAIL

Level.name: Effective Date Quarter
Level.caption: Effective Date Quarter
Level.description: Name or number of the Quarter

MeasureExpression.SQL: CASE WHEN CT_OUTSTANDING_RESERVE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE CT_OUTSTANDING_RESERVE END
CASE WHEN CT_ESTIMATED_LOSS_AMOUNT IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE CT_ESTIMATED_LOSS_AMOUNT END
CASE WHEN CT_PAYMENTS IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE CT_PAYMENTS END
CASE WHEN CT_RECOVERIES IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE CT_RECOVERIES END
CASE WHEN CT_OUTSTANDING_RECOVERIES IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE CT_OUTSTANDING_RECOVERIES END
CASE WHEN CT_INCURRED IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE CT_INCURRED END
CASE WHEN CT_TRANSACTION_AMOUNT IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE CT_TRANSACTION_AMOUNT END
CASE WHEN CT_PREV_OUTSTANDING_RESERVE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE CT_PREV_OUTSTANDING_RESERVE END
